name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the RM/HS before
    throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.

name: hadoop.zk.retry-interval-ms
description: Retry interval in milliseconds when connecting to ZooKeeper.

name: dfs.datanode.failed.volumes.tolerated
description:
The number of volumes that are allowed to
  fail before a datanode stops offering service. By default
  any volume failure will cause a datanode to shutdown.
  The value should be greater than or equal to -1 , -1 represents minimum
  1 valid volume.

name: ipc.client.connect.retry.interval
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for
    before retrying to establish a server connection.

name: dfs.namenode.max-corrupt-file-blocks-returned
description:
The maximum number of corrupt file blocks listed by NameNode Web UI,
      JMX and other client request.

name: dfs.client.cached.conn.retry
description:
The number of times the HDFS client will pull a socket from the
   cache.  Once this number is exceeded, the client will try to create a new
   socket.
